title: which champions have the shaco effect when ON YOUR team?
body:
if you dont know what the shaco effect is, it's when the enemy plays a champ, let's say shaco, and do a hyper carry.  but when you have a shaco on your team, he ends up feeding so hard, the whole team can practically afk and you guys will still lose.

these are the champions that have the shaco effect when on my team
{{champion:1}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:22}} 

the enemy seems to be a god with those champs, but whenever i have one of them in my team....i know it's going to be gg.
